completion.autoRequire.markdownDescription:
When the input looks like a file name, automatically `require` it.

[View in Wiki](https://github.com/sumneko/lua-language-server/wiki/Settings#completionautorequire)

markdownEnumDescriptions: Show both the function name and an autocomplete snippet.

completion.displayContext.markdownDescription:
Previewing the relevant code snippet of the suggestion may help you understand the usage of the suggestion. The number set indicates the number of intercepted lines in the code fragment. If it is set to `0`, this feature can be disabled.

[View in Wiki](https://github.com/sumneko/lua-language-server/wiki/Settings#completiondisplaycontext)

markdownEnumDescriptions: Show both the keyword and an autocomplete snippet.

completion.postfix.markdownDescription:
Choose the symbol used to trigger a "postfix" suggestion.

[View in Wiki](https://github.com/sumneko/lua-language-server/wiki/Settings#completionpostfix)

completion.showParams.markdownDescription:
Display parameters in completion list. When the function has multiple definitions, they will be displayed separately.

[View in Wiki](https://github.com/sumneko/lua-language-server/wiki/Settings#completionshowparams)

markdownEnumDescriptions: Only show context-based word suggestions when semantic-based suggestions are not available.

completion.workspaceWord.markdownDescription:
Whether context-based word suggestions should include words from other files in the workspace

[View in Wiki](https://github.com/sumneko/lua-language-server/wiki/Settings#completionworkspaceword)
